author: Dr15Jones
body:
#### PR description:

This is one component for fixing the workflow in the RNTUPLE builds. The other component has to go into the RNTUPLE only build.

#### PR validation:

Tested in RNTUPLE build and properly sets file extension.

resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1421
title: Keep proper file extension for ALCAReAlCaHLTHGComb workflow
